Maximum Length: 64  
Update requires: No interruption

RuleType.description: When you want to forward DNS queries for specified domain name to resolvers on your network, specify FORWARD. When you have a forwarding rule to forward DNS queries for a domain to your network and you want Resolver to process queries for a subdomain of that domain, specify SYSTEM.
RuleType.markdownDescription:
When you want to forward DNS queries for specified domain name to resolvers on your network, specify FORWARD. When you have a forwarding rule to forward DNS queries for a domain to your network and you want Resolver to process queries for a subdomain of that domain, specify SYSTEM.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: FORWARD | SYSTEM | RECURSIVE | DELEGATE  
Update requires: Replacement

TargetIps.description: An array that contains the IP addresses and ports that an outbound endpoint forwards DNS queries to. Typically, these are the IP addresses of DNS resolvers on your network. Specify IPv4 addresses. IPv6 is not supported.
